title: Healing-Work Quanta and Values-Systems
abstract: We will play a philosophical discussion game to open our conception of values to contexts and harmonics (word-pairs). If enough German-speakers attend, the game can be played in German. A brief description of the healing network will begin, followed by a deeper look at values.
description:
Loving Komona, you had the shortest.Plenum.Ever. Congrats. I don't want to do this during plenum, happy to do it at 8 again.

A whiteboard or paper would be helpful.
